review: Chromecast has changed my life. Gone are the days of hooking a computer to a screen, or buying media. I can now pull stuff digitally, use PLEX, and BOOM! Heaven.My only concern is for 4k content - when that becomes more mainstream how are we to get that in our households? Certainly not through these current models... (something to think about).

review: Easy to setup and easy to use, but only worked for a month before it suddenly quit working a becoming a doorstop. Called customer support and got through on the third try.  Passed around between a few people, asking me to troubleshoot, etc...  until I was told they need to converse with their "engineers" about the issue, (what issue? it's DEAD!) and someone will get back to me.  Obviously it's still under warranty but they don't want to replace it.  That was 2 weeks ago and still no phone call or email.  Just another big company that doesn't give a crap about it's customers.I also have a Roku and that works awesome.  Do yourself a favor and get a Roku
